::Perndabot/Reptilica::

Perndabot grins at BrightBlade, jerking his eyes back up to her face. "Of 
course. That's how it goes. Would you like an escort to the Maximals?"

Reptilica makes a desgusted noise, shutting up instantly as Perndabot begins 
to turn his head toward him.
